channel.title: I need classpath and path help
channel.description:
i know what to do i click
my computer > view system information > Advanced > environmental variables
i have jdk 6 update 7
tell me if this path and classpath is right...
path is C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
classpath is CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
thats for user variables... do i have to put it for system variables as well???

item.title: I need classpath and path help
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:

i know what to do i click

thats for user variables… do i have to put it for system variables as well???
